name: mern-web-app
description: A MERN app that uses TypeScript, React and MUI, and gets deployed to an Azure Web App on push to the "deploy" branch.

scripts.install: cd client && npm install && cd ../api && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../api && npm run build
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd api && npm run develop"
